TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFeatureValidationRule

summary.span: 表示要在验证 SharePoint 项目中的功能时应用的规则。

span.span: Represents a rule to apply when validating a Feature in a SharePoint project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口可定义自定义验证规则，以帮助验证 SharePoint 项目中的包是否有效。Implement the interface to define a custom validation rule to help verify that a package in a SharePoint project is valid. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建自定义功能和为 SharePoint 解决方案包验证规则](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-custom-feature-and-package-validation-rules-for-sharepoint-solutions)。For more information, see [How to: Create Custom Feature and Package Validation Rules for SharePoint Solutions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-custom-feature-and-package-validation-rules-for-sharepoint-solutions). 实现此接口的类必须包含由项目系统发现。Classes that implement this interface must include the to be discovered by the project system. ## Examples |日期Date|历史记录History|原因Reason| |----------|-------------|------------| |[!INCLUDE[dev10_cpub1](~/includes/dev10-cpub1-md.md)]|其中包含指向演示如何实现此接口的主题添加了新注释Added new remarks with links to topics that show how to implement this interface|[!INCLUDE[enhancement](~/includes/enhancement-md.md)]|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateFeature(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IFeatureValidationContext context) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: 与功能和验证关联的上下文数据。

span.span: Contextual data associated with the feature and validation.

summary.span: 确定功能当前是否与此规则冲突。

span.span: Determines whether a feature currently violates the rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示要检查的验证规则的对象。An object that represents the validation rule being checked.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateProjectItem(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IFeatureValidationContext context, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem projectItem) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: 与功能和验证关联的上下文数据。

span.span: The contextual data associated with the feature and validation.

param.name: projectItem
param.span: 用于验证功能的项目项。

span.span: The project item with which the feature is validated.

summary.span: 确定如果添加指定的项目项，功能是否会与此规则冲突。

span.span: Determines whether a feature would violate the rule if the specified project item is added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示要检查的验证规则的对象。An object that represents the validation rule being checked.
